price: (1) The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].[1577]
footnotes: [1577]- This was a sign given by Allāh to Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ) when the Quraysh challenged him to show them a miracle.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
